sourceDesc.p: This file was automatically compiled from Project Jarāʾid's main data file. All entity names in Latin script were then automatically translated into Arabic script.

revisionDesc.tei:change: Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.

Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
revisionDesc.change: Improved place nodes with GeoNames data, querying GeoNames for IDs (if already available) and toponyms, and adding alternative names, IDs, and geo-coded locations.
Automatically translated IJMES transcription of titles and names into Arabic script

Added references to OpenArabicPE's authority file (../data/tei/gazetteer_levant-phd.TEIP5.xml) and to GeoNames IDs to placeNames without such references based on places mentioned in the authority file.
Automatically translated IJMES transcription of titles and names into Arabic script
Improved place nodes with GeoNames data, querying GeoNames for IDs (if already available) and toponyms, and adding alternative names, IDs, and geo-coded locations.
Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.
